statements: UPDATE user_profiles SET age = 30, email = 'john.doe@example.com', preferences = '{"theme": "dark", "language": "en"}' WHERE user_id = '756716f7-2e54-4715-9f00-91dcbea6cf50';
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'Alice Smith', gender = 'female', age = 25 WHERE user_id = '351ab835-1e79-4c6b-b18a-08e24c338f56';
UPDATE user_profiles SET full_name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
UPDATE user_profiles SET email = 'johndoe@example.com', preferences = '{"theme": "dark", "language": "en"}' WHERE user_id = 'abcdef12-3456-7890-cdef-1234567890ab';
UPDATE user_profiles SET username='john_doe', first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value='dark' WHERE user_id=101 AND preference_name='theme';
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '123-456-7890' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_preferences SET preference_value = 'new_value' WHERE preference_name = 'theme' AND user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET username='Alice', age=30 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE UserPreferences SET preference_type='Theme', preference_value='Dark' WHERE preference_id=2;
UPDATE UserProfiles SET age = 30, gender = 'Other' WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE UserPreferences SET preference_value = 'Music' WHERE user_id = 102 AND preference_type = 'FavoriteGenre'
UPDATE user_profiles SET email='newemail@example.com', first_name='Alice' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE user_preferences SET theme='dark', language='Spanish' WHERE user_id=201;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'Alice', last_name = 'Smith', birthdate = '1990-05-15' WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE user_preferences SET language = 'Spanish', theme = 'Dark', notification_sound = TRUE WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE user_profiles SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_sessions SET end_time = '2023-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE user_profiles SET address = '123 Main Street, Apt 101' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_ratings SET rating = 4, timestamp = current_timestamp WHERE user_id = 456 AND rated_item_id = 789;
